Translations.Text: ami ebadata karina, tomara yara ebadata kara.
Ebam tomara'o ebadatakari na'o, yara ebadata ami kari
ebam ami ebadatakari na'i, yara ebadata tomara kara.
Tomara ebadatakari na'o, yara ebadata ami kari.
Tomadera karma o karmaphala tomadera jan'ye ebam amara karma o karmaphala amara jan'ye.
Yakhana asabe allahara sahayya o bijaya
ebam apani manusake dale dale allahara dbine prabesa karate dekhabena
Takhana apani apanara palanakartara pabitrata barnana karuna ebam tamra kache ksama prarthana karuna. Niscaya tini ksamakari.
Abu lahabera hastadbaya dhbansa hoka ebam dhbansa hoka se nije
kona kaje aseni tara dhana-sampada o ya se uparjana kareche.
Satbara'i se prabesa karabe lelihana agnite
ebam tara stri'o-ye indhana bahana kare
